name: OLDEN PEAK
description:
A short, challenging soulslike with metroidvania elements. Made in PICO 8 by Abhi Sundu.

Controls (Explained in-game)

  • Left/Right arrow to move
  • double-tap left/right to roll (invincible while rolling)
  • Z or C to jump
  • X to attack
  • Hold up arrow to view current stats
  • Down arrow to use healing flask

If you have trouble with a boss, you can try level grinding on some basic enemies to increase your health and stamina. You can also search for the 3 optional "elite" enemies that increase your sword damage when slain.
